comment.text: This key translates the label for a button that allows users to add an MCP (Minecraft server) to their AI settings. It appears on a button within the AI settings section, likely initiating a dialog for adding the server details. Translators should ensure the wording is clear and actionable for users managing their Minecraft server connections.
